title: Please suggest a sans serif typeface family that will work with Platelet as the display text.
content:
Please suggest a sans serif typeface family that will work with Platelet as the display text. Your input will be appreciated.

I have been looking for a situation where I could use Platelet for years! And have finally found it. But I need a good family to use with it for body copy, etc.

I could use your opinions on this... it should be a sans serif.
author: Bundlebrat

comments.content: If they aren't being used in the same line, the compatibility with Platelet isn't very important. What is important is that you use a text typeface that is appropriate for your subject matter. So, help us help you. What is the project?
